description:
<p>Sheffield Children’s Hospital is one of 3 dedicated Children’s Hospitals and we are looking to recruit Band 6 RMN Nurses to work with young people in our s136 Suite and provide additional clinical/operational support to the inpatient lodges at Becton Site in Beighton.</p>
<p>The Becton Centre for Children and Young People is a state-of-the-art centre for children and young adults aged up to 18 with serious and complex mental health issues. The Becton centre has 3 Inpatient Lodges (Sapphire Lodge 13-18yrs, Emerald Lodge 10-13yrs, Ruby Lodge for Learning disability 8-18 yrs) offering 24 hour care to young people 7 days a week. Across the lodges we have excellent and welcoming MDT teams, offering specialist assessment and interventions to children and young people. We continue to invest in our staff and offer the skills, supervision and training you require to provide excellent care. We aim to deliver first class, high quality care for children and young people referred to our services. Sound Interesting? Come and join us in Sheffield CAMHS…we look forward to hearing from you.</p>
title: Deputy Clinical Nurse Manager
